title: Yumemiru Otome
synopsis: Beautiful sisters Manaka and Mizuki Miyama study at a girls' school and live a carefree life. Strict Mizuki is absorbed in her studies, while cheerful Manaka dreams of a happy relationship and begins dating a handsome teacher. Having trusted, the girl comes to his house in the hope of having a romantic time. However, her naive dreams were not destined to come true.
